name: argocd-k8s-debugger-marketplace
description: ArgoCD Kubernetes Debugger plugin for Claude Code

plugins.name: argocd-k8s-debugger
plugins.description: Intelligent debugging assistant for applications deployed to GitOps-enabled Kubernetes clusters backed by ArgoCD. Helps developers and DevOps engineers troubleshoot failing deployments through interactive guided diagnostics.
plugins.author: Claude Code
